name: THRUSTER
description:
A more buoyant board with large surface area, the Thruster allows for easier drive with effortless speed, for any level of rider, the thruster gives a controlled ride on hard rails.
Squash tail – 15 ounce rails – 10 ounce deck – 5 ounce belly – Flat rocker w/ flip tip – 21” wide – 2 1/2” thick – 5’7” long – Epoxy or Polyurethane – FCS or Future fins – Gorilla grip traction – Your choice of graphics. (graphics + $50)

name: FISH
description:
The fastest board of the series, with its unique swallow tail the Fish allows for a looser maneuverable ride but with solid, effortless drive down the line, for fast, fin releasing tricks.
Swallow tail – 15 ounce rails – 10 ounce deck – 5 ounce belly – Flat rocker w/ flip tip – 21” wide – 2 1/2” thick – 5’7” long – Epoxy or Polyurethane – FCS or Future fins – Gorilla grip traction – Your choice of graphics. (graphics + $50)

name: PRO
description:
Exceptionally light and buoyant the Pro is a maximum thrust board for hard, clean drives down the line. The interchangeable thruster fin allows for alteration to suit your surf style and ability. A maneuverable and explosive board for the rider seeking maximum performance.
Squash tail – 15 ounce rails – 10 ounce deck – 5 ounce belly – Flat rocker w/ flip tip – 20” wide- 2 1/4” thick – 5’6” long – Epoxy or Polyurethane – FCS or Future fins – Gorilla grip traction – Your choice of graphics. (graphics + $50)

name: CLASSIC
description:
The Classic with rounded, mellow rails and large platform is for anyone who loves the sensation of an effortless soul ride. Purposely built for hanging toes and long lazy turns.
Squash or pin tail – 15 ounce rails – 10 ounce deck – 5 ounce belly Flat rocker w/ long board style nose – 22” wide – 2 5/8” thick – 5’6” long – Epoxy or Polyurethane – FCS or Future fins – Gorilla grip traction – Your choice of graphics. (graphics + $50)

name: T-Shirt (sold out)
description: Sick cotton white t-shirt with Stripes’ graphics on the front + the right sleeve. S, M, L, XL.
